_sText:
It's not my first map, but the second one I made and the first one I uploaded anywhere.

I created the map, because I had so many f**king fun on CS 1.6 with he_glass, so I decided to make a remake for CS:S with some improvements.
I hope you like it and I would be happy 'bout some feedback.

It would be nice if you would DOWNLOAD it from here: http://rapidshare.com/files/277187483/maps.rar cuz I'm getting collector-points for downloads.

To use it you have to put the .bsp into [f.e. c:\programs\steam\stamapps\yoursteamname\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps]

Yeah... As I already said: I hope you like it.

Cya and feedback me, maybe I'll make an update.

And PLEASE DOWNLOAD HERE: http://rapidshare.com/files/277187483/maps.rar
